title: PROHIBEAST
description:
Step into 1930s Chicago, a city plagued by corruption and the illegal meat trade.
In this tactical stealth game, take control of Eliot Ness and his team.
Use the environment to your advantage and strike the Mafia from the shadows to dismantle Al Capone’s criminal empire.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# PROHIBEAST
<!--text-->
**

> Prohibeast – Tactical Infiltration at the Heart of Prohibition

**
In Prohibeast, a real-time tactical infiltration game, dive into a corruption-ridden 1930s Chicago plagued by smuggling and black-market meat.
As meat consumption is outlawed, Al Capone expands his criminal empire over a ruthless black market. Faced with widespread corruption, Eliot Ness and his team of Untouchables are ready to strike from the shadows to bring down the mob from within.

**

> Infiltration and Strategy: Make Your Mark with Your Own Style

**
Each mission will put your sense of strategy and stealth to the test.
◆ **Plan your operations** – Choose your approach: stealthy infiltration, silent takedowns, or clever diversions.
 ◆** Exploit the environment** – Hideouts, alternate routes, distractions... Each mission offers multiple solutions.
 ◆ **Outsmart the enemies’ heightened senses** – Sharp eyesight, acute hearing, and keen smell… Discover a whole new way to play: infiltration is no longer just about hiding!


**

> Take Control of the Untouchables

**
As the leader of the Untouchables, take control of Eliot Ness and his elite team—a group of specialists with complementary skills where every member plays a key role in your infiltration operations:
◆ **Eliot Ness** – A fearless and versatile leader, able to adapt to any situation and lead even the riskiest missions to success.
 ◆ **Malone B. Clonan** – A loyal right-hand man and hardened veteran who favors a more direct, forceful approach.
 ◆ **Frank E. Eager** – A methodical and discreet sniper, eliminating targets with deadly precision.
Other specialists will also join your team to help refine your strategies.
Learn to harness each member's strengths and weaknesses to build unique strategies and strike the mob where they least expect it.

**

> Infiltrate Iconic Locations

**
Each mission plunges you into the heart of Chicago, in places where crime and corruption thrive.
Observe, plan, and adapt your approach to achieve your objectives without leaving a trace.
From the Loop—Chicago’s iconic district and hub of corrupt power—to the mayor’s mansion where criminal alliances are forged, and the foggy Lake Michigan docks, a major hub for smuggling, each location is filled with dangers and opportunities, demanding tailored strategies to survive.
But more criminal strongholds await, where the slightest mistake could be fatal.
Only the most strategic minds will manage to infiltrate without a trace.

**Can you operate from the shadows and bring down Al Capone’s criminal empire?**
